DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesis is lateral retinaculum release has no effect on treatment of Patellar Recurrent Dislocation with Medial Patellofemoral Ligament (MPFL) reconstruction.
DOC.brief_title: Medial Patellofemoral Ligament Reconstruction With or Without Lateral Retinaculum Release
DOC.criteria: age between 18yo and 45yo indication for MPFL reconstruction unilateral or bilateral indication indication for bony procedures previous surgery for PF disorders patient refusal
